medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Sash
marks: [昭和四年十一月] {Sho_wa yonen ju_ichigatsu} [言人画] {Kotondo ga}
description: so-called black version; head and torso of woman wearing black and white patterned kimono and obi with red, pink, green and white floral design; same image as L2001.372.155 with different colors
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
